MemberSignature.Value: abstract member AddSubtitleSource : System.IO.Stream * Android.Media.MediaFormat -> unit override this.AddSubtitleSource : System.IO.Stream * Android.Media.MediaFormat -> unit
public virtual void AddSubtitleSource (System.IO.Stream? is, Android.Media.MediaFormat? format);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void AddSubtitleSource(class System.IO.Stream is, class Android.Media.MediaFormat format) cil managed

Docs.param: input stream containing the subtitle data. It will be closed by the media framework.

the format of the subtitle track(s). Must contain at least the mime type (MediaFormat#KEY_MIME) and the language (MediaFormat#KEY_LANGUAGE) of the file. If the file itself contains the language information, specify "und" for the language.
Docs.summary: Adds an external subtitle source file (from the provided input stream.
